name: Space Hopper (Trois Cookies)
description:
Damn, when was the last time I saw you...
Am I going crazy?

I can't risk it.
I need to avoid the darkness.
Stick to the plan.

Hopping from planet to planet.
To get all the fuel I need,
To end all of this.
To reach the sun.

Developed in 9 days for the Godot Wild Game Jam #29.
All assets & musics have been created by us, for this Jam.
The theme was: Nomad

Controls:
WASD / ZSQD / Arrows: Move
Escape: Pause
R: Restart level
